dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: Hello there! It feels like a sentimental day.

dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: Could you recommend some music for me to listen to on my way home?
집에 가면서 들을 음악 좀 추천해주게나~
On a day like this, upbeat trot songs are the best! Clippety-clop~ Clippety-clop~
이런 날에는 역시 신나는 트로트죠! 쿵짝~쿵짝~쿵짜작~쿵짝
On a day like this, I secretly shed tears listening to breakup songs.
저는 이런 날이면...이별 노래를 들으며 남몰래 눈물을 훔친답니다.

dialogues.speaker: sheep
answer: You sure know something! Just thinking about it makes my rear end shake~
역시 뭘 좀 아는구만 자네! 생각만 해도 엉덩이가 들썩거린다네~
Listening to breakup songs while feeling the breeze... My painful memories come rushing back...
살랑이는 바람을 맞으며 듣는 이별노래라...내 아픈 추억들이 떠오르는구만...

dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: I'll go with this one for today!
